snippet: Scotland ran in five tries and conceded none for an emphatic 37-12 win over Tonga at Kilmarnock on Saturday, the first test involving a major rugby nation to be played on an artificial pitch....

headline.print_headline: Scotland Crush Tonga in Five-Try Rout
headline.main: Scotland Crush Tonga in Five-Try Rout

lead_paragraph: Scotland ran in five tries and conceded none for an emphatic 37-12 win over Tonga at Kilmarnock on Saturday, the first test involving a major rugby nation to be played on an artificial pitch.
